feed.title: Lychee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.1.2 - Fixes CSP for redirection
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump dependencies with Vite 5 & prevent some more type errors by @QuentiumYT in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2238
  • make JS invariant by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2241

New Contributors

  • @QuentiumYT made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2238

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.1.1...v5.1.2

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.2.0
entry.content:
Lychee is looking for contributors.

What's Changed

  • No more album ID within the history by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2242
  • Remove is_public & deprecated Public smart album by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2221
  • fix CVE-2020-8203 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2245
  • Add pulse when jobs are waiting/processing. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2239
  • Avoid white flash on v4 redirection by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2246
  • Fix upload photo by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2249
  • Prebuild folders in storage by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2250
  • Improve diagnostics by adding check of temporary file systems by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2251
  • Re-arrange commands by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2257
  • Null coalescence on css/js to catch when file does not exists. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2256
  • Add check for number of sizevariants without sizes. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2252
  • Composer update by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2261
  • Improve coverage by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2270
  • Avoid exception, add error when unlocking album. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2264
  • Update readme and few more by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2283
  • Remove issue templates. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2288
  • If LegacyIdException is thrown provide proper solution by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2291
  • Add support for Feature flags. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2282
  • Add discord link by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2308
  • Mark some classes are readonly by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2269
  • Support migration on docker builds without off time by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2286
  • Add permission when user is not owner but creating an album. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2298
  • Dependencies update. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2310
  • Fix Front-end bugs (swiping, uploading, margins) by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2140
  • Add preg_quote before doing glob() to escape regex characters by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2317
  • Add subalbum search by @Tombula in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2309
  • Bump livewire/livewire from 3.4.6 to 3.4.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2324
  • Pinning dependencies + fix permissions by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2325
  • Support Paths on V5 with Livewire by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2304
  • Fix livewire breaking on non debug with sub folder by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2326
  • only owner users with upload rights are allowed to edit albums by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2333
  • Proper markdown support on descriptions by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2335
  • Bump vite from 5.1.6 to 5.1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2340
  • Fix description markdown on the overlay. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2347
  • Fix share button always visible by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2346
  • Composer update + formatting by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2338
  • Improve logic for nested values in arrays for language by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2331
  • Create maintenance page by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2332
  • Channel version type is an Enum by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2330
  • add Optimize module to maintenance page. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2348
  • add Cleaning module by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2349
  • add Update module by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2350
  • Add fix tree module by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2351
  • add Fix Jobs module by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2352
  • Add button to generate missing size variants by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2353
  • Add module to fix the missing file sizes from size variants by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2354
  • Version 5.2.0 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2355

New Contributors

  • @Tombula made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2309

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.1.2...v5.2.0

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.2.1 - Header image per album
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Avoid crashing when livewire flag is set in tests by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2364
  • More relevant diagnostic data, less privacy invasive. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2362
  • [stacked 1] Prepare flag for photo processing by pipes by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2363
  • [stacked 2] Move Import & Parameters DTO by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2365
  • [stacked 3] Move RotateStrategy to Rotate action by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2366
  • [stacked 4] Move old create to Legacy code. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2367
  • [stacked 5] Add initial steps as Pipes by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2368
  • [stacked 6] Support for Duplicate flow using pipes by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2369
  • [stacked 7] Add standalone flow. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2371
  • [stacked 8] Refactor Save/Notify to use interface DTO. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2372
  • [stacked 9] Support video partners. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2373
  • [stacked 10] DTO more flexible on their creation process. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2374
  • [stacked 11] cleaner approach of the pipe execution. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2375
  • [stacked 12] Use pipes photo partners by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2376
  • Socialite keycloak support by @jsaathof in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2386
  • New feature for setting specific album header image #2202 by @aSouchereau in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2377
  • Remove non existing columns by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2387
  • Fix database license type by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2393
  • Version 5.2.1 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2388

New Contributors

  • @jsaathof made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2386
  • @aSouchereau made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2377

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.2.0...v5.2.1

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v5.2.2 - Hot Fix broken albums with no landscape images.
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes HTTP 500 "Attempt to read property "photo_id" on null" on album page when no photo is found for header by @nanawel in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2396
  • Use portrait when landscape is not available for header image by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2397
  • Version 5.2.2 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2398

New Contributors

  • @nanawel made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2396

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.2.1...v5.2.2

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 5.3.0 - Support for S3 & Copyright per album
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix description empty string creating bug in layout by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2400
  • Add S3 bucket support. by @Kovah in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2379
  • Fix teapot not flagging on phpinfo.php by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2411
  • Fix migration order by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2410
  • Add migration on forgotten license CC-BY-SA by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2416
  • Adjusted with suggested CSS by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2413
  • Adding copyright to albums #1838 by @ThanasisMpalatsoukas in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/1880
  • Version 5.3.0 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2417

New Contributors

  • @ThanasisMpalatsoukas made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/1880
  • @Kovah made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v5.2.2...v5.3.0
